comments.body:
_vimid is already provided by pyvmomi
_vimref is already provided by pyvmomi

If you are okay having these fields duplicated in the output, then merge it, otherwise have folks use these three _vim fields for the id, ref, and type provided by pyvmomi:

https://github.com/vmware/pyvmomi/blob/master/pyVmomi/VmomiSupport.py#L352

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +73,77 @@      - "guest_facts_0001['instance']['guest_question'] is defined"
      - "guest_facts_0001['instance']['guest_consolidation_needed'] is defined"
      - "guest_facts_0001['instance']['moid'] is defined"
      - "guest_facts_0001['instance']['vimref'] is defined"
      - "'portgroup_portkey' in guest_facts_0001['instance']['hw_eth0']"
